metadata.title: CVE-2022-4884 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Path-Traversal in MKP storing in Tribe29 Checkmk <=2.0.0p32 and <= 2.1.0p18allows an administrator to write mkp files to arbitrary locations via amalicious mkp file.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
